title: 10/22: Waiver Wire; Sanu Trade (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
A lot to discuss today and of course we start with the big Waiver Wire adds. Is Ty Johnson a must-add and must-start player? Can you go right back to Latavius Murray and Chase Edmonds or do you need to have a backup plan? We also react to the Mohamed Sanu trade (8:00) and wonder what it means for the other Patriots pass catchers. Plus a look at the key injuries that will impact your Waiver Wire moves (16:00) ... FAAB talk (22:00) and Top 3 priorities at each position! QB (24:45) including Gardner Minshew, Matthew Stafford and maybe Ryan Tannehill, RB (27:30) including Johnson and Wendell Smallwood, WR (32:00) including Kenny Stills and Corey Davis, TE (36:25) including Vance McDonald and some backups with good matchups, DST (39:15) and Kicker (41:30) ... Recapping NE-NYJ (42:00) and PHI-DAL (46:00). Where are we on Carson Wentz? Can you drop Miles Sanders? Speaking of which, we talk about some players who you could consider dropping this week (50:30) and then take a longer look into the Waiver Wire options at each position (53:40) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Kenny Stills, Ty Johnson, Chase Edmonds, Ryan Tannehill, Corey Davis and more! Plus we react to the Mohamed Sanu trade.
